title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory:
text_raw:
1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory: 

Wageningen Food Safety Research (WFSR), part of Stichting 
Wageningen Research 

WUR Campus Building 123 

Akkermaalsbos 2 

6708 WB Wageningen 

The Netherlands.
text_norm: 1 following laboratory designated official laboratory wageningen food safety research (wfsr) part stichting wageningen research wur campus building 123 akkermaalsbos 2 6708 wb wageningen netherlands

title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 2. The members of the following classes of persons are designated as
text_raw:
2. The members of the following classes of persons are designated as 

approved examiners at the above designated official laboratory: 

(i) Analytical Chemist; 

(ii) Project Leader; 

(iii) Analyst. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 November, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [586] 3
